mapper.select: SELECT TB.building_nm as buildingNm, TA.area_nm as areaNm, TF.floor_nm as floorNm, TD.door_nm as doorNm FROM T_DOOR TD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_BUILDING TB ON TD.building_id = TB.id LEFT OUTER JOIN T_FLOOR TF ON TD.floor_id = TF.id LEFT OUTER JOIN T_AREA TA ON TD.area_id = TA.id WHERE TD.id = #{doorId}
